GUILLEMETTE IS SITTING IN A CHAIR WITH
HER BACK TO THE DOOR. PIERRE ENTERS
VERY QUIETLY AND STEALS UP BEHIND HER
AS THO» TO SURPRISE HER WITH THE CLOTH.
SUDDENLY, WHEN HE IS QUITE CLOSE, SHE
TURNS AROUND WITH A START.

PIERRE
(ARCHLY, IN TONE OF TRIUMPH) Guess
what I’ve got.
GUILLE
What?
PIERRE
(REVEALS ROLL OF GOODS) Seel
GUILLE
(JUMPING FROM CHAIR - PLEASED) Oh,
it’s beautiful.
GUILLE
You swore to pay, or you gave a note.
(NOSE TO NOSE)
PIERRE
Nooo.
GUILLE
You gave a note?
